title: Jamf unveils its next round of features for managing and securing Apple devices￼
content:
Today, Jamf is unveiling a host of new features aimed to streamline the lives of Apple IT managers who manage devices for businesses, but also in education. At its special spring event, Jamf unveiled updates to Jamf Protect, a new Jamf Trust end-user app, and Jamf Safe Internet. Read on to learn more about the new features as well as release timing.

more…

The post Jamf unveils its next round of features for managing and securing Apple devices￼ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: During its Spring event, Jamf unveiled a host of new features for Jamf Protect along with a new internet filtering tool for K-12 schools.
